FireFall-IRC
============

An ingame IRC client for FireFall

See http://www.firefallthegame.com/community/threads/addon-ingame-irc.65422/ For more info.

![ingame](http://www.yayifications.net/firefall/addons/irc/IRC_FULLSCREEN.png)

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.

tagline: An ingame IRC client for FireFall
